root ROOT @dlowan	15.060439779775294
punct @dlowan ,	15.060439779775294
punct centuries ``	15.060439779775294
nmod:for @dlowan centuries	15.060439779775294
dep centuries the	15.060439779775294
amod the chinese	15.060439779775294
dep chinese used	15.060439779775294
amod curse ancient	15.060439779775294
dobj used curse	15.060439779775294
punct curse :	15.060439779775294
dep curse live	15.060439779775294
punct live `	14.367292599215348
amod times interesting	13.961827491107185
punct the '	13.674145418655403
det curse an	13.11452963071998
nmod:in live times	13.11452963071998
punct live !	13.11452963071998
aux live may	12.980998238095458
case centuries for	10.506562888174752
nsubj live you	10.341940908480199
case times in	9.648793727920253
